name: BEDMINSTER ASSOCIATES, Petitioner v. BEDMINSTER TOWNSHIP BOARD OF SUPERVISORS and Bedminster Township, Respondents
name_abbreviation: Bedminster Associates v. Bedminster Township Board of Supervisors

parties: BEDMINSTER ASSOCIATES, Petitioner v. BEDMINSTER TOWNSHIP BOARD OF SUPERVISORS and Bedminster Township, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of December 2010, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is LIMITED GRANTED. The issue, as stated by the Petitioner, is:
(a) Whether the Commonwealth Court erred in allowing the Township to use a municipal cure that was declared after the cure challenge was filed as a basis to dismiss the cure challenge because the Township “acted quickly.”
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
10 A.3d 897
BEDMINSTER ASSOCIATES, Petitioner v. BEDMINSTER TOWNSHIP BOARD OF SUPERVISORS and Bedminster Township, Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 17, 2010.
